Package edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui.Card
  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a card from an ordinary 52-card deck, including a rank, a suit, and whether the card is face-up or face-down. The rank and suit are immutable, but the face-up/face-down status may be changed (but only within the ui package).
    Author:
    bhoward

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Card​(Rank rank, Suit suit)
      Construct a card with the given rank and suit; it is initially face-down.
      Card​(Rank rank, Suit suit, boolean faceUp)
      Construct a card with the given rank, suit, and face-up status.
